TitleSelect: Facebook and Privacy: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Exploring Facebook: Social Networking and Privacy"
ListenList: Do you have a Facebook account?
Maria says she has a Facebook account.
John mentions he also has a Facebook account.
Anna confirms she uses Facebook as well.
How often do you check your Facebook account?
Maria checks her Facebook account several times a day.
John checks his account once a day.
Anna only checks Facebook a few times a week.
How many friends do you have on Facebook?
Maria has about 500 friends on Facebook.
John has around 300 friends on his account.
Anna has a smaller circle with about 150 friends.
What do you do on Facebook?
Maria likes to post photos and updates.
John uses Facebook to stay in touch with friends and join groups.
Anna enjoys reading news articles and following pages she likes.
What's the best thing about Facebook?
Maria thinks the best thing is staying connected with friends and family.
John likes that it is easy to find and join communities of interest.
Anna appreciates the ability to share and discover new content.
Do you have your boy/girlfriend on Facebook?
Maria has her boyfriend on Facebook.
John does not have a girlfriend currently.
Anna's boyfriend is also on her Facebook friends list.
What's something you don't like about Facebook?
Maria dislikes the amount of ads on Facebook.
John is concerned about privacy issues.
Anna finds the constant notifications annoying.
Have you ever had a problem on Facebook?
Maria once had her account hacked.
John had an issue with a fake profile.
Anna experienced some bullying in the past.
Are you well known on Facebook?
Maria says she is not very well known on Facebook.
John is somewhat known within his community groups.
Anna has a small but active friend group.
Do you chat on Facebook?
Maria often chats with friends on Facebook Messenger.
John uses Facebook Messenger occasionally.
Anna prefers chatting on other platforms but uses Facebook for group chats.
Do you know any story about a problem because of Facebook?
Maria knows someone who had their photos stolen.
John heard about someone losing their job because of a Facebook post.
Anna knows a story about a friend who got into trouble because of a Facebook argument.
Do you accept any friend request?
Maria is selective and only accepts requests from people she knows.
John sometimes accepts requests from mutual friends.
Anna only accepts requests from people she knows personally.
Do you have any private album that none of your friends can see?
Maria has a few private albums for family only.
John does not have any private albums.
Anna keeps some albums private for close friends and family.
How do you protect your album privacy on Facebook?
Maria sets her album privacy settings to "Friends Only."
John uses custom privacy settings to control who can see his albums.
Anna regularly checks and updates her privacy settings.
Do you have any celebrity on Facebook?
Maria follows a few celebrities on Facebook.
John does not follow any celebrities.
Anna follows some authors and musicians she likes.
What are some privacy concerns when using Facebook?
Maria worries about data breaches and personal information leaks.
John is concerned about Facebook tracking his online activities.
Anna is wary of sharing too much information and potential identity theft.
Do you think Facebook is good for keeping in touch with people?
Maria believes it is excellent for maintaining connections.
John thinks it's useful but prefers face-to-face interactions.
Anna finds it convenient but also values personal meetings.
How do you use Facebook for your hobbies?
Maria joins groups related to her hobbies, like photography.
John participates in discussion forums about his interests, such as hiking.
Anna follows pages that share content about her hobbies, like cooking.
Have you ever attended an event organized through Facebook?
Maria attended a school reunion organized on Facebook.
John joined a local hiking event he found on Facebook.
Anna went to a book club meeting organized through a Facebook group.
Do you think Facebook will remain popular in the future?
Maria thinks it will stay popular but may evolve.
John believes it might decline as new platforms emerge.
Anna feels it will remain useful for certain functions like events and groups.

seo.Topic: Exploring Facebook: Social Networking and Privacy
seo.Title: Exploring Facebook: Social Networking and Privacy
seo.metaTitle: Facebook and Privacy: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Exploring Facebook: Social Networking and Privacy"
seo.metaDescription: Explore the impact of Facebook on social networking and privacy concerns.

contentArray.content: Exploring Facebook: Social Networking and Privacy
Facebook has become a ubiquitous platform for social networking, connecting people worldwide.
Privacy concerns on Facebook have raised questions about data security and personal information.
The impact of Facebook extends beyond personal use, influencing social interactions and online behaviors.
Navigating Facebook's features requires awareness of privacy settings and digital etiquette.
